title: Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         VIP (Volunteer-in-Park) working a special event at Olmsted NHS NPS  Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site can be experienced in a variety of ways with varying levels of accessibility. Please call ahead if possible to speak to a staff member about accommodations that may be needed at 617-566-1689 ext. 221 Learn more about the accessibility of the house and grounds at Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site. Learn more about accommodations for those with hearing loss.
